overview: Worlds collide when rich girl Shruti (Tejasswi Prakash) falls in love with middle class boy Siddhant (Abhinay Berde). She is full of life and charming while he is quiet and sweet. Siddhant is serious about his career and looking after his mother. However Shruti convinces him to get into a relationship with her and he agrees. Everything looks hunky-dory until that one night that changes everything.
title: Mann Kasturi Re
